name: Emily & Zeus Adventures
description:
GDS Jam 2020 Submission (my first jam btw :00)

Theme: Disinformation and Conspiracy Theory

A dumb game with a dumb story with two dumb friends(?). 

How to play:

Use "A" and "D" to move left and right on the ground and drift in the air.  Use "W" to jump

Enjoy!

Disclaimer: You may need to change your window size to play the game properly with the right camera proportions.
